review.reviewBody: yummy pizza.i order regularly from them.
one pizza was OK but very dry. yhe other one was stale and cold. won't order from here again
Thin slices, just ok.will not order again because of lack of taste
I ordered a cheese Bianca and was sent one with tomato sauce. Carlessness  that made me have to drive all the way back to the restaurant to get it myself.
